summary: The diff shows only backend code changes (access control and profile management updates) and project state metadata updates. No deployment configuration, infrastructure setup, or production environment changes are present. The BuildRequest requires deploying the portfolio application to production with properly configured serving of static assets and Internet Identity authentication, but the diff contains no evidence of deployment implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the current version of the portfolio application to production
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration, infrastructure-as-code, CI/CD pipeline, or production environment setup is present in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: All frontend components render correctly in production
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend changes, build configuration, or production optimizations present

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend actor is deployed and accessible
missing_requirements.reason: No canister deployment configuration (dfx.json changes), network settings, or production deployment scripts present
No asset canister configuration, CDN setup, or static file serving configuration present

missing_requirements.requirement: Internet Identity authentication works in production
missing_requirements.reason: No production Internet Identity integration, canister ID configuration, or production authentication setup present

hallucinated_features.description: Access control system implementation with role-based permissions
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Preserve all existing functionality' and 'Do not modify' as constraints, yet backend/main.mo adds new MixinAuthorization system and AccessControl module not requested

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with authorization checks
hallucinated_features.reason: New user profile functions (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) added with permission checks were not requested in the deployment requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Certificate upload functionality with ownership tracking
hallucinated_features.reason: New uploadCertificate function with access control and ownership tracking was not requested and violates 'Adding new features' non-goal
